title: Week 9 Final Exam: E-commerce Security & Future Plans
description: Assessment on virtual cards, 3D secure protocols, anti-phishing strategies, and Present Continuous for fixed arrangements.

questions.question: What is a 'Virtual Card' primarily used for?
options: Withdrawing physical cash from an ATM
Paying in a physical store with a plastic card
Adding an extra layer of security for online transactions
questions.explanation: Las tarjetas virtuales se usan para añadir seguridad en compras online al no exponer los datos de la tarjeta física.

questions.question: In the 3D Secure flow, what is sent to your phone to authorize a payment?
questions.explanation: El OTP (One-Time Password) es el código de un solo uso enviado para verificar la transacción.

questions.question: Which term describes manipulating people into giving away secret information?
questions.explanation: La ingeniería social (social engineering) es la manipulación psicológica para obtener datos confidenciales.

questions.question: Identify the correct Present Continuous sentence for a fixed arrangement:
options: I am meeting the security team at 2 PM today.
I will meeting the team later.
questions.explanation: Se usa el Presente Continuo ('am meeting') para planes futuros ya organizados con hora y fecha.

questions.question: What does the 'S' in HTTPS stand for?
questions.explanation: La 'S' en HTTPS significa 'Secure' (seguro), indicando que el sitio usa cifrado.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'We __________ our new mobile app this Friday.'
questions.explanation: Con el sujeto 'We' se utiliza 'are launching' para expresar un plan futuro programado.

questions.question: What should you check for in the browser address bar before entering card details?
questions.explanation: El icono del candado y el protocolo HTTPS son indicadores esenciales de una conexión segura.

questions.question: If you receive a suspicious email asking for your PIN, it is likely a __________ attack.
questions.explanation: El phishing es el método fraudulento para robar información sensible a través de correos falsos.

questions.question: Complete the arrangement: 'Mr. Smith __________ to the fintech conference in London tonight.'
questions.explanation: Para un sujeto singular (Mr. Smith), usamos 'is flying' para planes fijos.

questions.question: What is the 'Checkout' stage of an online purchase?
options: The final step where payment is processed
Leaving a review after the product arrives
questions.explanation: El 'checkout' es el proceso final de pago y confirmación de un pedido online.

questions.question: Which of these is a benefit of using a Virtual Card?
options: You can lose it in the street
It can be frozen or deleted immediately after one use
It is made of recycled plastic
It works even without an internet connection
questions.explanation: Poder congelar o borrar la tarjeta virtual tras un uso es una gran ventaja de seguridad.

questions.question: Choose the correct negative form for a future arrangement:
options: I not am working this weekend.
I am not working this weekend.
I am not work this weekend.
questions.explanation: La forma negativa del presente continuo para el futuro es 'am/is/are + not + verb-ing'.

questions.question: What does '3D Secure' provide during checkout?
options: An extra authentication step with your bank
A discount on the total price
questions.explanation: 3D Secure añade un paso adicional de verificación (como un SMS del banco) para validar el pago.

questions.question: Complete the question: '__________ you __________ the client for lunch tomorrow?'
questions.explanation: En preguntas sobre planes futuros con 'you', usamos 'Are... meeting?'.

questions.question: A scammer calls you pretending to be bank support. This is an example of...
questions.explanation: Hacerse pasar por soporte bancario para engañar al usuario es un caso de ingeniería social.

questions.question: Which sentence describes a general intention, NOT a fixed arrangement?
options: I am flying to New York at 6 PM.
I am meeting the CEO on Tuesday.
I'm going to save some money next year.
We are launching the feature tomorrow morning.
questions.explanation: 'be going to' se usa para intenciones generales, mientras que el presente continuo se reserva para planes ya fijados.

questions.question: When is an OTP typically valid?
options: For a single transaction and a short time
questions.explanation: Un OTP es válido solo para una transacción específica y por un tiempo muy limitado (segundos o minutos).

questions.question: Complete: 'The developers __________ the server maintenance this Sunday at midnight.'
questions.explanation: Con el sujeto plural 'The developers', la forma correcta es 'are performing'.

questions.question: What is the safest way to access your bank's website?
options: Click a link in a random email
Type the official URL directly into the browser
Search for 'bank login' on a public forum
Click an ad on a social media site
questions.explanation: Escribir la URL oficial directamente es la forma más segura de evitar sitios de phishing.

questions.question: If you suspect phishing, what is the first thing you should do?
options: Reply to the email and ask if they are scammers
Send them your password to verify your account
Report the email and do not click any links
Forward the email to all your friends
questions.explanation: La respuesta correcta ante sospecha de phishing es reportar y nunca interactuar con los enlaces o remitente.
